thread.title: Coulter: Trump Could’ve Been ‘In Danger’ From ‘Enemy’ Media at WH Correspondents Dinner
thread.title_full: Coulter: Trump Could’ve Been ‘In Danger’ From ‘Enemy’ Media at WH Correspondents Dinner

author: Ken Meyer
title: Coulter: Trump Could’ve Been ‘In Danger’ From ‘Enemy’ Media at WH Correspondents Dinner
text:
Coulter: Trump Could’ve Been ‘In Danger’ From ‘Enemy’ Media at WH Correspondents Dinner by Ken Meyer | 10:45 pm, February 25th, 2017 
During Fox’s Justice on Saturday, Ann Coulter lavished praise on President Trump over his decision not to attend the White House Correspondents Dinner . 
After discussing sanctuary cities with Judge Jeanine Pirro , the conversation turned to Trump’s announcement that he won’t be showing up at the annual meeting between the president and the press. Coulter said she didn’t want Trump “hanging around with the enemy. He could be in danger at the White House Correspondents Dinner.” 
“He has everyone against him, I want him in the White House working,” Coulter said. “This is a frivolous event.” 
Coulter went on to defend Trump’s feud with the media by saying that he was taking aim at the “lying media” and not attacking the 1st Amendment or the free press. Circling back to her argument that Trump never mocked a disabled reporter during a campaign event, the conservative pundit continued by saying that the media is notorious for making up lies about POTUS on a regular basis. 
Watch above, via Fox.
